description: Tall, ripped Lukas Daken has a sexual fantasy he just needs to fulfill, and sets out seeking someone who will be able to satisfy his needs. He spends the day searching, but to no avail. Thinking he’s out of luck, he heads home where he meets his beefy next-door neighbor, Damien Stone! Dark-haired Lukas asks the stud if he’d be willing to cum in his mouth, and of course, Damien is more than happy to help him out.
title: Emergency Sex Part 2
